website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful advent calendar featuring some of Morris & Co's most popular items.
pros: Features vegan and cruelty free products including hand cream, body wash, lotion, hand scrubs, foaming bath, bath salts, and more
All are lightly scented without being overwhelming
Ingredients include shea butter and almond oil
cons: Some received calendars that were missing items

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the holidays!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the aesthetic of this Advent calendar as well as the print, style of products enclosed and the fact that it was in a well sealed box. The only thing I didn't like was the fact that the only fragrance feminine enough for my senses was "Library of Prints"(smells like florals and white tea). The other two scents enclosed with this Advent calendar both smelled very masculine and unappealing.
customer_reviews.author: Lost in the Crowd

customer_reviews.title: Classy, lovely scents, mostly bath gels & salts
customer_reviews.text: Lovely adult advent calendar with wonderful-smelling bath items. I was hoping for lotions, but it was mostly bath gels and salts (I don’t take baths - prefer showers). But the product itself is lovely and the scents were really nice. A fun change in advent gifts (over the usual chocolates).
customer_reviews.author: Shareen Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Sum of all the pieces = heavenly scents
customer_reviews.text: i purchased one each for my daughter and myself. so glad i did. Fine presentation with beautiful prints representing each day. Small but yummy smelling, creams,lotions, & bath salts make us want to repeat next year.
customer_reviews.author: elaine smith

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and a treat to open daily
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three of these. It was shipped from the UK, it was cheaper but I spent $40 on shipping. It was worth every penny. I gifted these to two people and kept one. It is a joy waking up to find a new surprise! They smell really good and the lotion is thicker than normal great for winter. The countdown continues. My loved ones love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Erika J

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and giftable advent calendar.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my mom as an advent calendar gift. The box is beautiful and she loves peacocks so it was perfect. The gifts inside were really nice and good quality and she really enjoyed them. I would definitely recommend this as a nice gift to someone special.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: A perfect holiday treat!
customer_reviews.text: This is a luxurious and great quality gift for anyone who loves treating themselves to a nice bath! I love the works of William Morris and Heathcote & Ivory do a wonderful job of presenting his artwork on their products. I also find that the bath products and sensitive skin and eczema friendly. :)
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This was so nice. I gave for Christmas stocking stuffers. Smells sooo nice! Everyone loved!
customer_reviews.author: FloridaGranny

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful to look at with lovely scents every day! This is a little pricey, but a winner all the way!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Mack

customer_reviews.title: Missing treats
customer_reviews.text: two sides are identical so half the dates are missing. Additionally, once they opened the second since there was no first, it was empty. So, missing half the dates and missing the advent treats. Please just get a refund for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Best I’ve ever seen . Excellent ! Worth the price & then some !
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful ! Elegant packaging & great quality products inside . I’ll order more next year !
customer_reviews.author: barbara e.

customer_reviews.title: Divine!
customer_reviews.text: I have been practicing self-care daily and doing little things each day just for me so I bought this on a whim and I love the scents. The foam bath is heavenly! I've never tried this brand before, and would buy again! I will be gifting this set next year if it's still available!
customer_reviews.author: mermaid_qt

customer_reviews.title: Advent Calender Women Will Love
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful! I love the products and the beautiful. This is a luxury holiday item to look forward to everyday!
customer_reviews.author: KYJenny

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Calendar
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful presentation. Lovely box. Contents seemed to repeat after a few days. But easily the nicest looking calendar we’ve had.
customer_reviews.author: D. Edwards-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Advent calendar
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was a lot more variety. I would have liked to see a mask as well as facial creams included.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Kitchen

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This comes in a really beautiful box, but did not have the variety of products we expected. We got 10 body washes and 8 bath salts.
customer_reviews.author: justine r erickson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous item, but was disappointed to find it at a much lower price at Marshall's right after I bought it here! Regardless, even at full price, it's a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Random Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely manner and was well packaged. It is a beautiful Advent box and the scents are lovely. The products have pretty illustrations and are nicely made. There are hand creams, shower gels, bath bombs, and bath salts.
customer_reviews.author: Difficult woman

customer_reviews.title: Meh. But a nice gift for tween girl.
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed. Products were teeny. The smells not great. Just ok. But for the money, it's not bad.
customer_reviews.author: marion niedringhaus

customer_reviews.title: They love it!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for what I wanted, arrived quickly, and in good condition. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: katiedid

customer_reviews.title: Unique advent calendar gifts
customer_reviews.text: Made great Xmas gifts and were unusual and delightful as an advent calendar. Perhaps a little overpriced for sample sized gifts.
customer_reviews.author: English Rose

customer_reviews.title: Perfect giftable!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter and 2 sisters and they loved them.
customer_reviews.author: DivaClaire

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful present for a daughter in laws birthday in late November
customer_reviews.text: Love all the products. They were high quality and wonderful to give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J. Washburn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm loving the products I have gotten (hand creme, bath fizz, shower gel). I'm looking forward to the rest of them.
customer_reviews.author: Angie B.

customer_reviews.title: Stunning gift! Beautiful presentation, fine quality, and surprises!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and I to share from the after Christmas sales. It has body lotion, foam bath, bath salts. hand lotion and more...(don't want to be a spoiler). The fragrances are DIVINE. The ingredients are fine quality. I don't know a woman who wouldn't love to open one of these each day. It is a beautiful box full of beautiful Arts and Crafts wallpaper patterns. I cannot wait to get another next year to count down for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: V. Hunter

product_meta.title: Morris & Co. Beauty Advent Calendar Blue Forest Peacock Print With 24 x Bath & Body Items Assorted Beauty Christmas Presents
product_meta.description:
"Have nothing in your houses that you do not know to be useful or believe to be beautiful." William Morris, 1880 An eclectic selection of iconic Morris & Co prints, brought together in a joyous Advent Calendar for the ultimate festive countdown. Fragranced with three signature scents: golden lily bursting with fresh citrus scents of tangerine and bergamot, blended with cinnamon and nutmeg spices on a base of cedar wood. Strawberry Thief with rich earthy notes of amber, sandalwood and patchouli, topped with refreshing notes of red berries and bergamot on a heart of rose. Library of prints with energising top notes of green tea and jasmine, intertwined with freesia and peach. Open a door each day to reveal a beauty necessity in the countdown to Christmas.

SET CONTAINS:
1 x 30ml hand cream, 4 x 15ml Hand Cream, 4 x 30ml Body Wash, 4 x 40g Bath Salts, 2 x 15ml Body Lotion, 1 x 15ml Hand Scrub, 1 x 15ml Cuticle Cream, 4 x 30ml Foam Bath, 3 x 10g Bath Fizzers
feature_bullets: Countdown to Christmas in refined Morris style with twenty four Assorted bath & Beauty products in three signature scents
Experience exciting products from our popular Morris ranges: Strawberry Thief, golden lily and library of prints
Stunning gold foil and beautiful Morris designs make this advent calendar a sophisticated gift for friends and family
Enriched with luxury ingredients such as shea butter and almond oil to leave skin feeling soft and delicately scented
Designed in England. Certified Vegan friendly and cruelty-free
